properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:31AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the Obion
River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* until further notice.
* At 10 AM Saturday the stage was...12.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 13.0 feet on Saturday January 11.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 13.0 feet by Saturday January 11 then
fall to around 11.5 feet and steady.
At 12.5 feet, Water is flowing over Highway 210 north of Halls.
Several low-lying roads near the South Fork of the Forked Deer River
are flooded..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
